about_the_game:
Enemies are hiding in the darkness, you will have to shoot into the darkness. The shot will light up the room and slow down time. Giving you a chance to aim and finish off the threat. Remember, every shot must have a reasonable shot. After all, ammo is scarce, not all patients are aggressive, and noise can attract really dangerous patients.



A real challenge awaits you in a gloomy psychiatric hospital, where every step can turn out to be a trap. Face the madness that lurks in the darkness and overcome your fears to survive. Only those who keep their sanity will be able to pass through the darkness and find the light.

You will not only have to get out of the building, but also help the survivors. Solve the puzzles and learn all the secrets of this gloomy hospital. An atmospheric thriller with immersive sound and realistic graphics that will leave you on the verge of a nervous breakdown. Survive in this crazy world and find your way to the light
